# MixedQuoterActions
[Git Source](https://gitlab.com/nomadhub/smart-contracts/blob/e023936db04d0b7e2f5bfdf55b2bcf9f827cb12c/contracts/v2/external/@pancakeswap/infinity-periphery/src/libraries/MixedQuoterActions.sol)

Library to define different mixed quoter actions.


## State Variables
### SS_2_EXACT_INPUT_SINGLE

```solidity
uint256 constant SS_2_EXACT_INPUT_SINGLE = 0x00
```


### SS_3_EXACT_INPUT_SINGLE

```solidity
uint256 constant SS_3_EXACT_INPUT_SINGLE = 0x01
```


### V2_EXACT_INPUT_SINGLE

```solidity
uint256 constant V2_EXACT_INPUT_SINGLE = 0x02
```


### V3_EXACT_INPUT_SINGLE

```solidity
uint256 constant V3_EXACT_INPUT_SINGLE = 0x03
```


### INFI_CL_EXACT_INPUT_SINGLE

```solidity
uint256 constant INFI_CL_EXACT_INPUT_SINGLE = 0x04
```


### INFI_BIN_EXACT_INPUT_SINGLE

```solidity
uint256 constant INFI_BIN_EXACT_INPUT_SINGLE = 0x05
```
